item.title: Nicky add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Donâ€™t believe what your eyes are telling you. All they show is limitation. Look with your understanding. Find out what you already know and you will see the way to fly." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Nicky add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "The creatures outside looked from pig to man, and from man to pig, and from pig to man again; but already it was impossible to say which was which." -- George Orwell

item.title: Nicky add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Now cracks a noble heart. Good-night, sweet prince; And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest. " -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Nicky add a quote by Anthony Burgess
item.description: "You needn't take it any further, sir. You've proved to me that all this ultraviolence and killing is wrong, wrong, and terribly wrong. I've learned me lesson, sir. I've seen now what I've never seen before. I'm cured! Praise Bog! I'm cured! I was cured alright." -- Anthony Burgess

item.title: Nicky add a quote by Anthony Burgess
item.description: "Well, well, well, well. If it isn't fat, stinking billygoat Billy-Boy in poison. How art thou, thy globby bottle of cheap, stinking chip-oil? Come and get one in the yarbles, if you have any yarbles, you eunuch jelly thou." -- Anthony Burgess
